name: Friendship Club
description: Imaginary friends do battle in the mind of young Timmy Bibble! Who will be victorious in this arena of improbable dimensions, where no two rooms are the same and bullets bounce forever?! Get your buddies together for the ultimate showdown in this bullet hell party game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 or later Processor: 1.5GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 Compatible, OpenGL Shading Language 1.5+ Storage: 128 MB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360速 Controller for Windows速 (or equivalent) is strongly recommended.
